b:widget.title: Navbar

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.div: This is a short description in the author block about the author. You edit it by entering text in the "Biographical Info" field in the user admin panel.

div.script: var pageNaviConf = { perPage: 8, numPages: 9, firstText: "First", lastText: "Last", nextText: "Next", prevText: "Prev" }
